data.title: Streaktools: Simulation, measurement, and fitting of satellite-generated streaks
data.name: streaktools
data.description: Python tools designed for the simulation, measurement and fitting of intentional satellite generated streaks for the purposes of photometric calibration

evidence: "Python tools designed for the simulation, measurement and fitting of intentional satellite generated streaks for the purposes of photometric calibration" indicates a domain-specific research application for simulation and measurement.
The description focuses on performing simulations and measurements rather than being a reusable library advertised for other software to depend on, suggesting an end-user research tool.
No mention of package managers, releases, or binaries; only the repository README is shown, implying distribution primarily via the source repository.
